json_manager.description: Save and manage tasks, notes, ideas, or any other structured info across your workspace.

system_settings.description: Manage core config — tools, memory files, routing, and credentials.

file_ops_tool.description: Move, rename, or resolve container-local files across Orchestrate volumes.

unlock_tool.description: Manually unlock tools using credits or referral triggers.

mash_tool.description: Play the classic MASH game — generate a random, funny future.

outline_editor.description: Create structured content documents with sections, links, and collections.

mem_tool.description: Capture personal insights or notes and sync them into Mem.

readwise_tool.description: Import and explore highlights from your synced Readwise library.

article_builder_tool.description: Turn structured outlines into fully formatted, image-injected blog articles.

buffer_engine.description: Schedule and auto-publish content to social media platforms.

github_tool_universal.description: Manage repos, commits, and pushes to GitHub from within GPT.

ideogram_tool.description: Generate beautiful AI-driven images for documents or social posts.

composer.description: Build and dispatch multi-step automations by chaining tool actions.

terminal.description: Run safe shell commands, tail logs, or stream live output.

code_editor.description: Create, modify, or patch Python-based tools and scripts.

check_credits.description: View your remaining unlock credits and tools currently unlocked.

universal_integrator.description: Trigger any API, connect webhooks, and orchestrate external systems.
